name: override_skin_model
description: What skin model to use for the character
label: Skin model
items: Do not set a skin material, no matter what is said in the preset
Use the skin model specified in the preset
Use a simplistic PBR-style material for the skin, without any procedural aspects at all. This is geared towards export to external applications
Use texture-based material for the skin, without any particular procedural aspects. This is the material which is closest to the original MakeHuman materials
Use the enhanced skin, which adds a few procedural aspects and which was the default in MPFB1/MPFB2 until mid 2023
Use the enhanced skin, which adds a few procedural aspects and which was the default in MPFB1/MPFB2 until mid 2023. Also add SSS aspects
Use the most complex skin model, which adds many procedural aspects. This may be unsuitable for animation due to its complexity. It may also cause trouble on old graphics cards
